title: Game Won't Open after Initial Close
body:
So often when a game starts I won't connect. I will get a "Check your internet connection prompt."

I used to fix this by just closing everything and restarting the client. Sometimes I would have to repair corrupted files etc.

Now what happens is after the game closes (For any reason, through task manager, standard close), the game will not reopen and I'll have to restart my computer.

I've tried repairing the client and reinstalling the game and am not sure where to proceed from here.

Thanks.

replies.body:
What may be happening is that your client loses its ability to maintain a good connection to our servers, thus cannot even connect to the patching servers to start up again. Normally, this is caused by certain network settings that conflict with League, so our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) is a great place to start in troubleshooting this further.

Let me know if those steps caused any changes you were able to observe.
